newsitem.title: ESTONIA: TALLINNA SAYS PROFIT ESTIMATE UNCHANGED.
newsitem.headline: TALLINNA SAYS PROFIT ESTIMATE UNCHANGED.

text.p: Tallinna Pank said on Tuesday that its board decided last week not to change its 1997 net profit estimate.
"The board has decided to keep the estimate unchanged," the bank's development director Gunnar Okk told Reuters.
Okk added that the decision was taken because the bank's results to date have been broadly in line with previous estimates.
Tallinna's consolidated half-year net profit was 38 million kroons, 43.5 percent of the estimated profit of 87 million kroons for the whole year.
The bank earlier said the result was four million kroons higher than expected.
